lines: You wake up alone in the middle of your prison cell. You don't know why you are here...
And you can't even remember your name... Suddenly, you hear the sound of keys and...
"Hey Theodore, how are you ? First day with us ! Here's your meal... "
choices: 1 - You are too disoriented to talk to the guard and close your eyes without eating
2 - You thank the guard and accept your meal.
